data.text: “Wobɛfrɛ a frɛ, na hena na obegye wo so?
Ahisɛm kum ɔkwasea,
Mʼankasa mahu ɔkwasea a ɔrefefɛw,
Ne mma ne bammɔ ntam kwan ware,
Nea ɔkɔm de no no di ne nnɔbae,
Ahokyere mpue mmfi dɔte mu
Nanso wɔwo nnipa to ɔhaw mu
“Nanso sɛ ɛyɛ me a, anka meguan atoa Onyankopɔn;
Ɔyɛ anwonwade a wontumi nhwehwɛ mu,
Ɔtɔ osu gu asase so;
Ɔde ahobrɛasefo si nea ɛkorɔn,
Ɔsɛe aniferefo nhyehyɛe,
Ɔkyere anyansafo wɔ wɔn anifere mu,
Sum duru wɔn awia ketee;
Ogye ahiafo fi afoa a ɛhyɛ wɔn anom;
Enti ahiafo wɔ anidaso,
“Nhyira ne onipa a Onyankopɔn teɛ no,
Efisɛ ɔno na opira na ɔno ara akyekyere;
Obegye wo afi ɔhaw ahorow asia mu;
Ɔkɔm ba a, obegye wo afi owu mu,
Wɔbɛbɔ wo ho ban afi ntwirii ho
Wobɛserew ɔsɛe ne ɔkɔm;
Wo ne afuw so abo bɛyɛ apam,
Wubehu sɛ wo ntamadan wɔ bammɔ;
Wubehu sɛ wo mma bɛyɛ bebree;
Wode ahoɔden bɛkɔ ɔda mu,
“Yɛahwehwɛ eyi mu, na ɛyɛ nokware
